text:
For easier viewing the XML-Data in detail view, I added some colors in the html
output of the detail view. It's not perfect, but for me it work's.
creator: rolf.metternich@ahafabrik.de

text:
Created attachment 21490
Some color for the UglyBrowser detail view
creator: rolf.metternich@ahafabrik.de

text:
Thanks for the patch, but unfortunately it can not be applied. UglyBrowser does
not exist anymore, it has been replaced by the full featured web administation
console. Please take a look at it in the latest release, 1.2m1. Thanks!
creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
